src_original: bhāryāyācitaka
tgt_original: bhāryā-yācitaka

src_original: munau bruvāṇe 'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu /  prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ // Saund_4.1 //
tgt_original: munau bruvāṇe'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu |  prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ ||1 ||

src_original: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ /
tgt_original: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ |

src_original: nācintayad vaiśramaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tatsthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam // Saund_4.2 //
tgt_original: nācintayad vaiśramaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tatsthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam ||2 ||

src_original: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti /  dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā // Saund_4.3 //
tgt_original: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti |  dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā ||3 ||

src_original: sā hāsahaṃsā nayanadvirephā pīnastanātyunnatapadmakośā /  bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa // Saund_4.4 //
tgt_original: sā hāsahaṃsā nayanadvirephā pīnastanātyunnatapadmakośā |  bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa ||4 ||

src_original: rūpeṇa cātyantamanohareṇa rūpānurūpeṇa ca ceṣṭitena /
tgt_original: rūpeṇa cātyantamanohareṇa rūpānurūpeṇa ca ceṣṭitena |

src_original: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ // Saund_4.5 //
tgt_original: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ ||5 ||

src_original: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ /
tgt_original: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ |

src_original: atītya martyānanupetya devān sṛṣṭāvabhūtāmiva bhūtadhātrā // Saund_4.6 //
tgt_original: atītya martyānanupetya devān sṛṣṭāvabhūtāmiva bhūtadhātrā ||6 ||

src_original: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ /
tgt_original: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ |

src_original: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau // Saund_4.7 //  kandarparatyoriva lakṣyabhūtaṃ pramodanāndyoriva nīḍabhūtam /  praharṣatuṣṭyoriva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandvaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam // Saund_4.8 //
tgt_original: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau ||7 ||  kandarparatyoriva lakṣyabhūtaṃ pramodanāndyoriva nīḍabhūtam |  praharṣatuṣṭyoriva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandvaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam ||8 ||

src_original: parasparodvīkṣaṇatatparākṣaṃ parasparavyāhṛtasaktacittam /  parasparāśleṣahṛtāṅgarāgaṃ parasparaṃ tanmithunaṃ jahāra // Saund_4.9 //
tgt_original: parasparodvīkṣaṇatatparākṣaṃ parasparavyāhṛtasaktacittam |  parasparāśleṣahṛtāṅgarāgaṃ parasparaṃ tanmithunaṃ jahāra ||9 ||

src_original: bhāvānuraktau girinirjharasthau tau kinnarīkiṃpuruṣāvivobhau /
tgt_original: bhāvānuraktau girinirjharasthau tau kinnarīkiṃpuruṣāvivobhau |

src_original: cikrīḍatuścābhivirejatuśca rūpaśriyānyonyamivākṣipantau // Saund_4.10 //  anyonyasaṃrāgavivardhanena taddvandvamanyonyamarīramacca /  klamāntare 'nyonyavinodanena salīlamanyonyamamīmadacca // Saund_4.11 //
tgt_original: cikrīḍatuścābhivirejatuśca rūpaśriyānyonyamivākṣipantau ||10 ||  anyonyasaṃrāgavivardhanena taddvandvamanyonyamarīramacca |  klamāntare'nyonyavinodanena salīlamanyonyamamīmadacca ||11 ||

src_original: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham /
tgt_original: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham |

src_original: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā // Saund_4.12 //
tgt_original: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā ||12 ||

src_original: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam /
tgt_original: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam |

src_original: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk /
tgt_original: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk |

src_original: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ // Saund_4.14 //
tgt_original: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ ||14 ||

src_original: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa /
tgt_original: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa |

src_original: bhavecca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra // Saund_4.15 //  cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena /
tgt_original: cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena |  patrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre'sya tāmeva vinirdudhāva ||16 ||

src_original: patrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre 'sya tāmeva vinirdudhāva // Saund_4.16 //  tataścalannūpurayoktritābhyāṃ nakhaprabhodbhāsitarāṅgulibhyām /  padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ // Saund_4.17 //
tgt_original: tataścalannūpurayoktritābhyāṃ nakhaprabhodbhāsitarāṅgulibhyām |  padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ ||17 ||  sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse |

src_original: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse /  suvarṇavedyāmanilāvabhagnaḥ puṣpātibhārādiva nāgavṛkṣaḥ // Saund_4.18 //
tgt_original: suvarṇavedyāmanilāvabhagnaḥ puṣpātibhārādiva nāgavṛkṣaḥ ||18 ||

src_original: sā taṃ stanodvartitahārayaṣṭirutthāpayāmāsa nipīḍya dorbhyām /
tgt_original: sā taṃ stanodvartitahārayaṣṭirutthāpayāmāsa nipīḍya dorbhyām |

src_original: kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti jahāsa coccairmukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena // Saund_4.19 //
tgt_original: kathaṃ kṛto'sīti jahāsa coccairmukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena ||19 ||

src_original: patyustato darpaṇasaktapāṇermuhurmuhurvaktramavekṣamāṇā /  tamālapatrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_4.20 //  tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam /
tgt_original: patyustato darpaṇasaktapāṇermuhurmuhurvaktramavekṣamāṇā |  tamālapatrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat ||20 ||

src_original: raktādhikāgraṃ patitadvirephaṃ saśaivalaṃ padmamivābabhāse // Saund_4.21 //
tgt_original: tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam |  raktādhikāgraṃ patitadvirephaṃ saśaivalaṃ padmamivābabhāse ||21 ||

src_original: nandastato darpaṇamādareṇa bibhrattadāmaṇḍanasākṣibhūtam /  viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa // Saund_4.22 //
tgt_original: nandastato darpaṇamādareṇa bibhrattadāmaṇḍanasākṣibhūtam |  viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa ||22 ||

src_original: tatkuṇḍalādaṣṭaviśeṣakāntaṃ kāraṇḍavakliṣṭamivāravindam /  nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva // Saund_4.23 //
tgt_original: tatkuṇḍalādaṣṭaviśeṣakāntaṃ kāraṇḍavakliṣṭamivāravindam |  nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva ||23 ||

src_original: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ /
tgt_original: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ |

src_original: tathāgataścāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveśa veśma // Saund_4.24 //
tgt_original: tathāgataścāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveśa veśma ||24 ||

src_original: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe 'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva /
tgt_original: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva |

src_original: tasmādatho preṣyajanapramādād bhikṣāmalabdhvaiva punarjagāma // Saund_4.25 //
tgt_original: tasmādatho preṣyajanapramādād bhikṣāmalabdhvaiva punarjagāma ||25 ||

src_original: kācit pipeṣāṅgavilepanaṃ hi vāso 'ṅganā kācidavāsayacca /
tgt_original: kācit pipeṣāṅgavilepanaṃ hi vāso'ṅganā kācidavāsayacca |

src_original: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca // Saund_4.26 //  tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam /
tgt_original: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca ||26 ||  tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam |

src_original: kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā // Saund_4.27 //  kācit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ /
tgt_original: kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā ||27 ||

src_original: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhādiva dīptamarkam // Saund_4.28 //
tgt_original: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhādiva dīptamarkam ||28 ||

src_original: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca /
tgt_original: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca |

src_original: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe // Saund_4.29 //
tgt_original: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe ||29 ||

src_original: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ |

src_original: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ // Saund_4.30 //
tgt_original: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ ||30 ||

src_original: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam /
tgt_original: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam |

src_original: cacāla citrābharaṇāmbarasrakkalpadrumo dhūta ivānilena // Saund_4.31 //
tgt_original: cacāla citrābharaṇāmbarasrakkalpadrumo dhūta ivānilena ||31 ||

src_original: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce /
tgt_original: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce |

src_original: karttu gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ māmabhyanujñātumihārhasīti // Saund_4.32 //
tgt_original: karttu gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ māmabhyanujñātumihārhasīti ||32 ||

src_original: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva /
tgt_original: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva |

src_original: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco 'bhyuvāca // Saund_4.33 //
tgt_original: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco'bhyuvāca ||33 ||

src_original: nāhaṃ yiyāsorgurudarśanārthamarhāmi kartuṃ tava dharmapīḍām /
tgt_original: nāhaṃ yiyāsorgurudarśanārthamarhāmi kartuṃ tava dharmapīḍām |

src_original: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ // Saund_4.34 //
tgt_original: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ ||34 ||

src_original: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam /
tgt_original: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam |

src_original: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam // Saund_4.35 //  athāpyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayyeṣyasi tvaṃ tvaritaṃ tatastvām /
tgt_original: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam ||35 ||

src_original: nipīḍayiṣyāmi bhujadvayena nirbhūṣaṇenārdravilepanena // Saund_4.36 //
tgt_original: athāpyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayyeṣyasi tvaṃ tvaritaṃ tatastvām |  nipīḍayiṣyāmi bhujadvayena nirbhūṣaṇenārdravilepanena ||36 ||

src_original: ityevamuktaśca nipīḍitaśca tayāsavarṇasvanayā jagāda /
tgt_original: ityevamuktaśca nipīḍitaśca tayāsavarṇasvanayā jagāda |

src_original: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ // Saund_4.37 //
tgt_original: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ ||37 ||

src_original: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena /
tgt_original: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena |

src_original: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra // Saund_4.38 //  sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī /  sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva // Saund_4.39 //
tgt_original: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra ||38 ||  sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī |  sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva ||39 ||

src_original: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca /
tgt_original: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca |

src_original: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum // Saund_4.40 //  chātodarīṃ pīnapayodharoruṃ sa sundarīṃ rukmadarīmivādreḥ /
tgt_original: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum ||40 ||  chātodarīṃ pīnapayodharoruṃ sa sundarīṃ rukmadarīmivādreḥ |

src_original: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa // Saund_4.41 //
tgt_original: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa ||41 ||

src_original: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa /
tgt_original: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa |

src_original: so 'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ // Saund_4.42 //
tgt_original: so'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ ||42 ||

src_original: adarśanaṃ tūpagataśca tasyā harmyāttataścāvatatāra tūrṇam /  śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ // Saund_4.43 //
tgt_original: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ ||43 ||

src_original: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
tgt_original: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ |

src_original: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_4.44 //
tgt_original: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ ||44 ||

src_original: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti /
tgt_original: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti |

src_original: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti // Saund_4.45 //
tgt_original: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti ||45 ||

src_original: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare 'pi tathā gatābhimānam /
tgt_original: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare'pi tathā gatābhimānam |

src_original: daśabalamabhito vilambamānaṃ dhvajamanuyāna ivaindramarcyamānam // Saund_4.46 //
tgt_original: daśabalamabhito vilambamānaṃ dhvajamanuyāna ivaindramarcyamānam ||46 ||

src_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryāyācitaka” nāma caturtha sarga samāpta /
tgt_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryā-yācitaka“ nāma caturtha sarga samāpta |
